content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Mining Setup at (60.0, -57.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (60.0, -57.0)
- Wooden chest at (60.5, -55.5)
Currently non-operational due to lack of fuel

### Lab Setup
- Lab at (10.5, 0.5)
Currently non-operational due to lack of power
Contains 15 automation science packs

### Power Infrastructure
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Electricity network with multiple poles centered around (-17.4, 19.0)
Currently non-operational - pump not connected and network unpowered

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Harvesting Errors
- When attempting to harvest resources, ensure you are within reach of the resource
- Verify the exact position of resources before attempting to mine them
- When setting coordinates for mining, ensure they are precise and within the resource patch

### Entity Placement and Removal Errors
- Before attempting to pick up entities, verify they exist at the specified coordinates
- When placing entities, ensure you have all required items in inventory
- Check if the placement area is clear and valid before attempting to place structures

### Crafting Errors
- When crafting complex items like boilers, ensure you have all base resources (like stone) before attempting to craft
- For items requiring sub-components (like stone furnace for boiler), gather all raw materials first

### Power System Errors
- Ensure power generating components are properly connected in sequence
- Check that all electrical components are connected to the power network
- Verify fuel supply for power generating structures

### API Usage Errors
- When using GetEntities API, avoid passing lists as parameters
- Ensure proper import and definition of entity types before using them in code
- Use correct data types when working with entity prototypes
